.... WORD WORDS: When I use the phrase "buy the farm" for death, I'm using one

search_results.title: Jeopary Questions page 1254 - ANATOMIC QUOTES - TriviaBistro ...

question: When I use the phrase "buy the farm" for death, I'm using one of these, from the Greek for "auspicious words"
